alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Otsego; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 5:45PM EST until March 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...REPLACES WINTER STORM WARNING PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Lake effect snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, highest amounts west of I-81. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Tompkins, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego and Delaware counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and create icy spots on previously plowed roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered lake effect snow showers will continue into the overnight hours, though winds will continue to be gusty. Blowing and drifting snow will be the main hazard overnight. Also, wind chills will also drop between 0 and -10 degrees at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, and for Pennsylvania at 511pa.com. Or, dial 5-1-1 from with the respective state.
